divergences.description: Agent B claims the code threshold is 9 and proposes updating README to match. The code is actually 8 (verified). Agent C and A correctly do not propose this erroneous change.
Agents B and C correctly identified obsolete 'Judge' and 'XML' references in README. Agent A missed these.

rationale: Agent C provided the most accurate analysis, correctly identifying documentation rot without hallucinating code changes (unlike Agent B who incorrectly claimed the threshold was 9). Agent A failed to spot the stale documentation.
